# How To Use The Intelligent Waitlist

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/how-to-use-the-intelligent-waitlist/

## Category
02 Calendar And Appointments

## Subcategory
Intelligent Waitlist

## Article Content

HOME
CALENDAR & APPOINTMENTS
INTELLIGENT WAITLIST
Adding and Finding Waitlist Entries

To manage the waitlist, you must be an Admin user, or you must have the Can manage waitlist permission enabled in Staff Member settings.

Link copied
Adding waitlist entries

By default, clients cannot add themselves to the waitlist in online booking. To change this, follow these steps.

To add a waitlist entry, open the waitlist from the calendar. To open the waitlist in the mobile app, tap the filters button and select Go to Waitlist.

Select New Entry.

Enter the details and select Add To Waitlist or Create (mobile app).

Link copied
Finding waitlist entries

You can use the waitlist filters to search for waitlist entries by date, staff member, and location. You can also view waitlist entries with available openings.

To view all future waitlist entries, you can remove all filters.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
